title: Pork Fried Rice
description: Pork Fried Rice - Kenji López-Alt tested
ingredients: ½ lb pork tenderloin or char siu, diced
steps: Heat wok until smoking. Add 1 tbsp oil. Stir-fry pork until cooked, 2-3 minutes. Transfer out.
Add 1 tbsp oil. Scramble eggs, break into pieces. Transfer out.
Add remaining oil. Stir-fry garlic 30 seconds.
Add rice, press flat. Let sit 30 seconds, then stir. Repeat until hot and crispy.
Add peas, cook 1 minute. Return pork and eggs. Add soy sauce, toss.
Drizzle with sesame oil, add scallions and white pepper.
